headline: Ask HN: Scanning Packages for Malware (Mac)
description: Hey so I have been wanting to download packages .pkg for various GarageBand plugins, audio units whatever. I’m new to Mac but since these packages are downloaded from the web not the App Store, how do I check/scan for malware etc? Last thing I want is a plug-in doing dodgy things. Thanks in advance
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 扫描软件包中的恶意软件(Mac)
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 掃描軟件包中的惡意軟件(Mac)
